meanings.definition: A mixture of three isomeric compounds, cresol, used as a disinfectant.
meanings.sent1: The hospital used cresyls to clean and disinfect the operating rooms.
meanings.sent2: The cresyls were effective in killing germs and bacteria.
meanings.sent3: The janitor accidentally spilled the cresyls, creating a bubble bath for the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her meticulous cleaning routine turned the room into a sterile oasis with the help of cresyls.
meanings.sent5: The strong smell of cresyls lingered in the air, assuring everyone of its disinfecting power.

meanings.definition: A derivative of cresol, used in the production of plastics and resins.
meanings.sent1: The factory workers mixed cresyls into the plastic to enhance its durability.
meanings.sent2: Cresyls are essential components in the manufacturing of various synthetic materials.
meanings.sent3: The artist accidentally spilled cresyls into the paint, creating a unique texture.
meanings.sent4: The cresyls infused the resin with strength, making the final product long-lasting.
meanings.sent5: The chemical engineer carefully measured the cresyls to ensure the quality of the plastic.
